mapper.select:
select count(1) all_head_count from tbl_electricpilehead t where t.delete_flag = '0'
and exists (select 1 from tbl_electricpile e where e.pk_ElectricPile = t.pk_ElectricPile and exists (select 1 from tbl_user_business_view b where b.user_id=elPi_UserId and exists (select 1 from tbl_user_business_view b1 where b.busi_company_id = b1.busi_company_id and b1.user_id = #{userId})))
and exists (select 1 from tbl_electricpile e where e.pk_ElectricPile = t.pk_ElectricPile and elPi_UserId=#{userId})
and exists (select 1 from tbl_electricpile e where e.pk_ElectricPile = t.pk_ElectricPile and e.elPi_OwnProvinceCode = #{province})

SELECT left(a.chOr_Createdate,7) '收益月份', count(1) '充电次数', sum(a.chOr_Moeny) '充电金额', sum(a.chOr_QuantityElectricity) '充电度数' FROM tbl_chargingorder a, tbl_electricpile b, tbl_electricpilehead c WHERE a.chOr_PileNumber = b.elPi_ElectricPileCode AND b.pk_ElectricPile = c.pk_ElectricPile AND a.chOr_ChargingStatus >= 2 AND c.ePHe_ElectricpileHeadId = '1' group by left(a.chOr_Createdate,7) order by left(a.chOr_Createdate,7);

SELECT DISTINCT coCo_Content FROM tbl_ConfigContent a, tbl_electricpile b, tbl_electricpilehead c WHERE a.pk_ConfigContent = b.elPi_PowerSize AND coCo_ConfigParameterID = 4 AND coCo_ConfigPStatus = 0
and exists(select 1 from tbl_electricpilehead c where c.pk_ElectricPile = b.pk_ElectricPile and c.pk_ElectricpileHead = #{headId})
select cv_license_number from tbl_car_vin t where t.cv_vin_code=#{carVin} limit 1
